name: The Game Jam Game About Games, Secrets and Stuff
name_original: The Game Jam Game About Games, Secrets and Stuff
description:
This is an early, game jam version of the game known now as The Secret of Tremendous Corporation.

In the near future, thanks to unhealthily understood copyright and patent laws creeping in everywhere they could, all of the gaming industry became controlled by one corporation, producing low quality but highly profitable casual freemium games and ceasing development of any other more ambitious genres.

Assist young Max Burton, a mighty gamedev wannabe and an enthusiastic fresh intern on his first day at his first job in the only gamedev company out there in this little point-and-click adventure game. Explore the deepest SECRETs™ of the company. Find out what happened to indie devs and check what do they do now!

Team members:

  • Konrad Burandt
    graphics, animations
  • Sebastian Krzyszkowiak
    puzzles, elevator animation, programming, story, dialogs
  • Paweł Radej
    programming, dialogs, story

This game uses these sounds from freesound:

  • tv turn off.aif by harpoyume | License: Attribution Noncommercial
  • JM_NOIZ_Buzz 01 - Neon Light.wav by Julien Matthey | License: Creative Commons 0
  • Elevator Beeping x4.wav by dauser | License: Creative Commons 0
  • elevator inside.wav by Trautwein | License: Creative Commons 0

Made on Global Game Jam 2015.
